definition: to cause trouble for sb/to inconvenience
to add/to increase/to replenish
variant of 麻[ma2]/hemp
generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
surname Ma
to feel vexed/to bother/to trouble/superfluous and confusing/edgy

sentences.english: But, also can give you incommode sometimes, produce plastic shoe dermatitis.
sentences.chinese: 但是，有时也会给您添麻烦，发生塑料鞋。

sentences.english: Leave me alone and stop buggering me about.
sentences.chinese: 走开，别再给我添麻烦了。

sentences.english: I’m afraid it‘s a bother for you to do this.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕做这件事会给你添麻烦。

sentences.english: Do I bother you when we go on vacations?
sentences.chinese: 我们出去度假时我给你添麻烦了吗？

sentences.english: And anyway I don't want to beg for Edgar's help, or make trouble for him.
sentences.chinese: 况且反正我不想求艾加帮忙，说不定还会给他添麻烦。

sentences.english: Why should he think I have come here to add to you trouble?
sentences.chinese: 他为什么会认为我是来给你们添麻烦的呢？

sentences.english: Please don’t go to so much trouble. I don’t want to put you out.
sentences.chinese: 请不要非那么多工夫，我不想给你添麻烦。

sentences.english: I did not want to add to his troubles or to lead him into more danger.
sentences.chinese: 我不想再给他添麻烦或者把他引向更危险的处境。

sentences.english: I hope weve not put you to any trouble.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我们没有给你添麻烦。

definition: to create difficulties/to invite trouble/to be troublesome
(coll.) to cause trouble for sb/to inconvenience
to look for trouble
to make people feel even more stressed or annoyed (coll.)/to make traffic congestion even worse
to lose face/humiliation
unworthy/to let down/I'm sorry/excuse me/pardon me/if you please/sorry? (please repeat)
to request sb to do sth/please!
to cause trouble
to let sb down/to be unfair/I'm sorry/pardon me (formal)
to feel very apologetic
to involve/to implicate sb/to spread to others (harm, trouble, damage etc)
to apologize
to look for employment/to pick a quarrel
to make a mess of sth
to disturb/to bother/to trouble
to disturb/to trouble
